title: Depression Support
verses: Psalm 34:18 (WEB) — “Yahweh is near to those who have a broken heart.”
Psalm 42:11 (WEB) — “Hope in God; for I shall still praise him.”
Matthew 11:28–29 (WEB) — “Come to me… and you will find rest for your souls.”
Isaiah 61:3 (WEB) — “A garment of praise for the spirit of heaviness.”
body: God meets you in the low places. Speak honestly to Him; invite a trusted friend; consider wise care. Let small rhythms of Word, prayer, and movement carry you through.
prayer: Jesus, Man of Sorrows, be near. Lift my head, lighten my burden, and fill me with Your comfort and hope today. Amen.
